"Probing the Cause of Dragorii Aggressio:
"I heard the good news, that you got your
exploration permit for the Skyscape. Now you
can join me on a request that will take us there!
I placed it myself. See, I gotta look into
what's making the dragorii turn aggressive
over there, but it'll be a tough one.
That's why I'll need your help.

*Go with Zeno only and complete the
request with an S Rank."

"聞いたぜ、お前さん、浮遊大陸の探索許可が
下りたらしいな。
もしよければ、ちょっくら俺の依頼に
付き合ってくれないか？

浮遊大陸での龍族の凶暴化を調査するって
案件でな。少々手を焼きそうなんで
お前さんが来てくれると助かるんだが。

※ゼノのみ同行、Ｓランククリア"
